Mostly just lurking and enjoying the kindness. Never had a twitter or anything, so quite new to this whole format. Software Developer and aficionado of all things gaming. Longtime fan of LoadingReadyRun, which is what led me here.
[ He/Him ]
Avatar is a photo of the character Jar Jar Binks from Star Wars Episode 1 holding a red lightsaber. Call it 50% because I have always found the vitriol against a comedy fictional character amusing, and 50% because I love the "Sith Lord Binks" theories :P.
